content: from back to front from * to * around omitting the last half_double_crochet and close with around the post of indicated stitch invisible join cut yarn fpsc - front post single_crochet insert hook from front to back 2 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 7 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space around the post of indicated stitch _____________________________________________ round 7 with new color stand half_double_crochet in any corner chain space half_double_crochet ch2 2 half_double_crochet in same chain space *half_double_crochet in each st across to next corner 2 half_double_crochet ch2 2 half_double_crochet in next corner chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends 19 half_double_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space design by © koernerklaus 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is up to me
